title: (x) Saltwater logo - Digitalis {Lex}
content:
Hi all!

Can anyone please ID this font for me?

P.S. Just managed to get a larger image.

Ta!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [saltwater.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20110124001524/http:/typophile.com/files/saltwater.gif) | 1.79 KB |
| [saltwater.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20110124001524/http:/typophile.com/files/saltwater_0.gif) | 2.52 KB |
author: Duckworth

comments.content:
Thanks wizard7926, It's OK I suppose. I'm not too thrilled with it now.

Especially this incarnation - somebody has messed with the kerning so that it's very tight on the 'sal', and that isn't the original 'w'.

Nick Cooke

Nick - You might not be thrilled with it but you're wrong. It's a belter!

We've just bought it :)

Keep up the good work

Si

P.S. The Saltwater logo is from a restaurant in Nottingham city centre (the Cornerhouse development) [http://www.saltwater-restaurant.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20110124001524/http:/www.saltwater-restaurant.com/ "http://www.saltwater-restaurant.com")

It's posh btw!
